definition[0]: as shown by something or stated by someone
example[0]: According to the police, his attackers beat him with a blunt instrument.
example[1]: There is now widespread support for these proposals, according to a recent public opinion poll.
definition[1]: in a way that depends on differences in situations or amounts
example[2]: You will be paid according to the amount of work you do.
definition[2]: in a way that agrees with a system or plan, or obeys a set of rules
example[3]: The game will be played according to rules laid down for the 1992 Cup.
example[4]: Everything went according to plan, and we arrived on time.
